        public User getUserByUserID(String userID)
                     throws CredibilityException
        Specified by:
        getUserByUserID in interface IUserApplication
        Parameters:
        userID - the user id into the eclipse environment
        Returns:
        the user from the parameter userID. If the user does not exists, this methods creates it.
        Throws:
        CredibilityException - if an error occured.

      • getCurrentPCMMRole

        public Role getCurrentPCMMRole(String userID)
                        throws CredibilityException
        Specified by:
        getCurrentPCMMRole in interface IUserApplication
        Parameters:
        userID - the user id
        Returns:
        the current PCMM role of the userID in parameter. If the user associated to the userID is null, return null.
        Throws:
        CredibilityException - if an error occured.
